flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36>>36 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36=$<<120+36=158>>158
So he makes 158*25=$<<158*25=3950>>3950 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 3950*4=$<<3950*4=15800>>15800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156.0, not 158.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
